name: $89 Special Fresh! City Loft Apt

description:

The space
Perfect **Sunny** City Apartment, Open Concept, Loft Like Studio/Suite

SPECIAL!! ***All Remaining Nights this Month!!! $89 nt, 3 night minimum up to 2 guests..(Taxes, fees for cleaning and airbnb site fees are additional and not included) Perfect for Vacation and Extended Stays! Ask for this months promotion!
